column1: 10,000 health workers have been infected by coronavirus so why are @Amazon @usbank @3m are holding up the production of millions of face masks and gloveshttp://sumof.us/632009105t?referring_akid=73094.5049876.rfs1LT&referring_source=fwd
State and local governments are hurting for cash as a result of the coronavirus pandemic. Public employees are bracing for a wave of layoffs.

Aren’t flu symptoms similar to Coronavirus symptoms. Could that be the reason? And people wonder is the numbers on the virus are accurate. They’re all crap . How else is Fauci and the left going to keep the lockdown going? #FakePandemic #FakeNews

I have a bad feeling they won't convict Chauvin. My hope is at an all time low right now for the right thing to happen. Not to mention this coronavirus is suppose to hit hard again. Anxiety is at an all time high.

If only we would we choose to learn the #brave #art of what I call, "#CatchAndRelease:" #learn to #embrace & fully #enjoy what we have #NOW, and let people & things go when it's time for them to leave. #mentalhealth #grief #anxiety #COVID19 #coronavirus #ThinkBIGSundayWithMarsha
